channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will resume sending weapons to Ukraine after pausing last week
item.description: With Russian attacks escalating, Ukraine is dependent on air defense systems and munitions supplied by western allies to protect Ukrainian cities.

item.title: With Indus Waters Treaty in the balance, Pakistan braces for more water woes
item.description: In an unprecedented move, India held the water treaty in abeyance after blaming Pakistan for a deadly attack in April. Pakistan denies involvement in ...

item.title: A Planet Money guide to 5 fascinating new econ papers
item.description: The Planet Money newsletter rounds up some new economics studies.

item.title: How to help Texas flood survivors. And, health organizations sue RFK Jr.
item.description: Search efforts are still ongoing after the deadly Texas floods. Here's how you can help survivors. And RFK Jr.'s vaccine policy has sparked a lawsuit.

item.title: IRS says churches can now endorse political candidates
item.description: Since 1954, an IRS rule had barred houses of worship from explicitly endorsing political candidates.

item.title: The tech behind Rivian’s 2026 Quad-Motor truck and SUV — and that kick turn
item.description: Rivian has opened customer orders for its second-generation quad-motor R1S and R1T EVs.
